sections.label: Stage 2 — 2026–2027
sections.title: Launch of Regional Showrooms
sections.subtitle: Opening physical showrooms in Airitom, Shavat–Dashoguz, Bekabad, and Andarkhan to enable direct product placement and market entry.
sections.card-text: Scale participation and increase trade activity across regional centers.
